channel.title: Run.bat error...(GIVING REWARD)
channel.description:
i need some1s help no1 can give me the CORRECT answer, the error is:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
someone please help, i will give a reward

item.title: Run.bat error...(GIVING REWARD)
item.dc:creator: @hippyss hippyss
item.description:
@hippyss wrote:

You all who tried to help him make me laugh, must i break down the error? NoClassDefFoundError the class EGUI doesn’t exist open up your run.bat and change EGUI to client

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat error...(GIVING REWARD)
item.dc:creator: @manofwar12 manofwar12
item.description:
@manofwar12 wrote:

[quote=“Goodoo dolls, post:8, topic:168384”]that didnt work for me i got this error

[code]
woofdawg23’s awsome compiler + runner

~By Woofdawg23~
If you leech i will take to further actions…

ECHO is off.


Type r to Run Client.

Type c to Compile.

Type e to Exit.

choose an option please . . . r
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: client : Unsu
pported major.minor version 8241.8224
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code][/quote]

ok, rightclick over it, extract to csk_client v-3 if you havnt already. a yellow folder will come on your desktop, open it. scroll down and look for run.bat, thats simple. after you find it rightclick over it and click edit, delete whats there and replace it with:
[code]@ECHO OFF
TITLE CSk-Client
color 0a
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar client
pause[/code]

hope that helps.


try this, it may not help though. but its what im running on.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat error...(GIVING REWARD)
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

[quote=“woofdawg23, post:4, topic:168384”][code]TITLE woofdawg23’s awsome compiler + runner
@ECHO OFF
CD files
color 09

:info
CLS
ECHO woofdawg23’s awsome compiler + runner
ECHO.
ECHO ~By Woofdawg23~
ECHO If you leech i will take to further actions…
ECHO.
ECHO
ECHO.
ECHO ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
ECHO.
ECHO Type r to Run Client.
ECHO.
ECHO Type c to Compile.
ECHO.
ECHO Type e to Exit.
ECHO.
SET option=
SET /p option=choose an option please . . .
if %option%==r goto runclient
if %option%==c goto compile
if %option%==e exit

:runclient
@echo off
TITLE WideScreen Client
java -Xmx500m -cp . client
pause
ECHO.
ECHO.
GOTO info

:compile
@echo off
COLOR 09
title compile
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac” -cp . *.java
pause
ECHO
ECHO
GOTO info[/code]

use this run and compile.java WILL WORK. I made it my client.[/quote]

OMG FINALLY!!! TY SO MUCH REP++

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat error...(GIVING REWARD)
item.dc:creator: @woofdawg23 woofdawg23
item.description:
@woofdawg23 wrote:

[code]TITLE woofdawg23’s awsome compiler + runner
@ECHO OFF
CD files
color 09

:info
CLS
ECHO woofdawg23’s awsome compiler + runner
ECHO.
ECHO ~By Woofdawg23~
ECHO If you leech i will take to further actions…
ECHO.
ECHO
ECHO.
ECHO ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
ECHO.
ECHO Type r to Run Client.
ECHO.
ECHO Type c to Compile.
ECHO.
ECHO Type e to Exit.
ECHO.
SET option=
SET /p option=choose an option please . . .
if %option%==r goto runclient
if %option%==c goto compile
if %option%==e exit

:runclient
@echo off
TITLE WideScreen Client
java -Xmx500m -cp . client
pause
ECHO.
ECHO.
GOTO info

:compile
@echo off
COLOR 09
title compile
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac” -cp . *.java
pause
ECHO
ECHO
GOTO info[/code]

use this run and compile.java WILL WORK. I made it my client.
